data.title: Green Farm KentGB
data.meta_description: Book luxurious ESPA Spa Treatments & Spa Day at The Spa at Green Farm to enjoy our signature Massages, Facials & much more.
data.text:
Lose yourself in an ESPA Inner Beauty Facial where your entire upper body will be deeply cleansed, hydrated and renewed, showing instant results, whilst pure essential oils will encompass and relax your mind. The facial is tailored to your skin's precise needs leaving it clear, quenched and naturally glowing. The additional scalp, arm and hand massage will leave you feeling deeply calm, peaceful and completely rejuvenated. 55 minutes

A truly holistic experience combining a deep cleansing back exfoliation with powerful back massage using essential oils to soothe, relax and balance. This is followed by an ESPA Intensive Facial tailored to your individual needs and finishes with a therapeutic head massage to help clear the mind, calm the spirit, and ease tension. 85 minutes

​

Add Hot Stones £10

What better way to get exactly what you need than selecting your favourite elements, perfect for both men and women. Choose your pressure: gentle, medium or firm and choose the ESPA oils that best fit your mood for the day. 55 minutes

​

Add Hot Stones £10

​

Chakras are the seven subtle energy centres in the body which affect our equilibrium and inner harmony. Recognised in both Ayurvedic and Chinese philosophies, blocked and congested Chakras can affect the body and mind both emotionally and physically. Natural energies are stifled and zest for life is lost or subdued. After a full body exfoliation, the body is massaged using individually tailored essentials oils to release tension around next and shoulders, and leave your body feeling soothes and spirit calm. The treatment continues with a mini facial and scalp massage. 115 minutes

Visibly smooth, firm and tone hips, thighs and legs. This highly effective, stimulating treatment targets cellulite, fluid retention and uneven skin texture. It uses potent marine extracts, iced mitts, a deep detoxifying massage and specialised stomach massage techniques to help cleanse and purify the colon, giving excellent results. This treatment is ideal for people concerned by the appearance of cellulite. A course of six treatments is recommended. Includes: Skin brushing hip, thigh and abdominal areas – Detoxifying salt & oil scrub with iced mitt removal – Detoxifying and lymphatic drainage massage techniques to hip and thigh areas – Specialised colonic massage – Body moisturiser application. 55 minutes

A 45 minute treatment for stressed shoulders and back. Begin your treatment with a body brush to remove dead skin cells and stimulate circulation, followed by a spearmint exfoliation going into a tailored aromatherapy oil massage to suit your emotional and physical needs. Warmed marine mud hydrating mask is applied to your back along with a heated towel whilst the mask hydrates you will have backs of legs massaged to complete your treatment. 45 minutes

A deeply nourishing body massage designed to target areas prone to stress and tension during or after pregnancy. Gentle back exfoliation, if required, is followed by a soothing body massage specifically designed to suit your individual concerns, focusing on the areas needed to alleviate muscular aches, whilst helping to relax, restore and revitalise. A course of 6 treatments is recommended following the first trimester of pregnancy. Includes: Back exfoliation (if required) – body/scalp massage – this treatment is tailored to your specific needs. 55 minutes.

Only suitable for 12 weeks and more

​

​

A form of massage therapy using slight pressure is applied to specific areas along your feet focusing on certain reflex points to leave you feeling energised and rejuvenated and promote wellness in other areas of the body. Benefits of this Holistic treatment can include:

Balances the body’s natural system to revitalise and increase energy flow stimulating the central nervous system

Promote a state of deep relaxation

Increase of blood flow and circulation

Improved sleep

Elimination of toxins

Your therapist will have a short consultation with you prior to your treatment to identify areas to focus on. 55 minutes

The perfect manicure/pedicure for those who are on the go. A quick spruce up for the hands or feet! It will include a glorious cleanse to either the hands or feet, a tidy up of the nails and then you can pick a colour of choice. 25 minutes

The complete package for your hands and nails. You will get your nails filed, your cuticles pushed back. You’ll receive a cuticle soak, hand cleanse and mini massage. To finish off you will choose your desired colour and then it’ll be applied. If you chose not to have your nails painted it will be finished off with a nourishing nail/cuticle oil. 45 minutes

This is the complete package for the feet and nails. You will receive a foot cleanse, your nails will be filed and cuticles worked on, hard skin will be removed from the feet. You’ll get an invigorating foot scrub, mini foot and lower leg massage and an application of your chosen colour. 55 minutes

The perfect manicure/pedicure for those who are on the go. A quick spruce up for the hands or feet! It will include a glorious cleanse to either the hands or feet, a tidy up of the nails and then you can pick a colour of choice. 25 minutes
